page.title: 02BASLOW ROAD
page.content: The A621 runs S.W. through this block from the {Totley Rise }shops to the {Peacock Inn }on the edge of the moors. This busy road is now controlled by lights at its junction with Glover Road.There had been great local concern about the number of serious accidents which had occurred on the bend near to the junction. Most of Totley's amenities are situated along this road as far as the bus terminus at {The Cross Scythes {Inn.}Beyond this the road climbs through farmland and gives extensive views of the moors which are Totley's 'backdrop'.They include {Totley Moss } beneath which runs the railway tunnel.The {Sheffield_Manchester line} through the Hope Valley & Edale uses the {Totley Tunnel.}
